20101209230121.000|20101209230123.000|CCO|THE CLOSE-KNIT PETIT FAMILY--AT
20101209230123.000|20101209230125.000|CCO|MORNING CHURCH SERVICES. BILL, A
20101209230125.000|20101209230127.000|CCO|PROMINENT DOCTOR, HAD BEEN
20101209230127.000|20101209230129.000|CCO|MARRIED TO HIS WIFE JENNIFER, A
20101209230129.000|20101209230131.000|CCO|NURSE, FOR 22 YEARS. THEIR
20101209230131.000|20101209230133.000|CCO|17-YEAR-OLD DAUGHTER HAYLEY WAS
20101209230133.000|20101209230135.000|CCO|A POPULAR "A" STUDENT, CAPTAIN
20101209230135.000|20101209230137.000|CCO|OF THE BASKETBALL TEAM, AND
20101209230137.000|20101209230139.000|CCO|HEADED TO DARTMOUTH IN THE FALL.
